column1: === {{TranslateThis | anchor = en | en = Ministry of Health Hospital ID (Indonesia) }} === {{Property proposal |status = ready |description = {{TranslateThis | en = hospital id from Board for Development and Empowerment Human Resources of Health, Indonesian Ministry of Health | id = pengenal rumah sakit dari Badan Pengembangan dan Pemberdayaan SDM Kesehatan, Kementerian Kesehatan RI }} |subject item = |infobox parameter = |datatype = external-id |domain = item |allowed values = \d{7} |allowed units = |source = |example 1 = {{Q|107645349}} â†’ [http://bppsdmk.kemkes.go.id/info_sdmk/info/fasyankes?unit=1171145 1171145] |example 2 = {{Q|107645817}} â†’ [http://bppsdmk.kemkes.go.id/info_sdmk/info/fasyankes?unit=1172016 1172016] |example 3 = {{Q|19731704}} â†’ [http://bppsdmk.kemkes.go.id/info_sdmk/info/fasyankes?unit=5171016 5171016] |example 4 = |planned use = |number of ids = |expected completeness = {{Q|21873974}} |formatter URL = http://bppsdmk.kemkes.go.id/info_sdmk/info/fasyankes?unit=$1 |external links = |see also = |robot and gadget jobs = |subpage = Indonesian Hospital ID |topic = organization |applicable stated in value = |single best value constraint = |distinct values constraint = |Wikidata project = }} ====Motivation==== {{Ping project|Indonesia}} After listening to the talk on WikidataCon, I realized we can link Indonesian hospitals to the official govt site. ::{{ping|Volstand}} I have a dataset with all hospitals and I can import them to Wikidata using Openrefine. Let me know if you want to help. [[User:Germartin1|Germartin1]] ([[User talk:Germartin1|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 14:29, 2 November 2021 (UTC)

:::When it's time to do the import, I wish the description of each hospital would be defined as at least "hospital in [province name], Indonesia", rather than only "hospital in Indonesia". Better yet if it can include city/regency name where it's located. [[User:RXerself|RXerself]] ([[User talk:RXerself|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 06:40, 24 November 2021 (UTC)
